::Kup::

While still in truck mode, Kup begins to go over the whole story.

Kup: His name is Lord Jhiaxus. We discovered his group on the far side of the galaxy. Apparently back during the second Great War several Decepticons either left on their own or were exiled by Galvatron. They all banded together for all these centuries in that sector. Eventually Starscream showed up there in the form of his damn undestructable "ghost" spark. They gave him a new body and formed a new empire. With all their advances they are known as the Generation 2 Decepticons. Their co-lead by Starscream and Jhiaxus. I'm not sure why but Jhiaxus has some kind of grudge against Rodimus dateing back to the Great War. I don't remember him from then so I have no idea what the grudge is about.

Kup pauses before he goes into what else he had heard over the subspace channels before he was shot down.

Kup: While I was fighting Jhiaxus and before I was shot down, I was monitoring the subspace Maximal channels. It seems that the Generation 2 Decepticons attacked Earth. Cybertronian/Human relations were reopened when the Maximals sent the majority of their advanced fighting force to defend Earth. What the high elders didn't count on was the unstable peace on Cybertron. With the opportunity open the Predacon government declared war on the Maximals. Not just the secret Tri-Predacus order this time, all of the Predacons. The third Great War has started....

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  OOC: Let's do something happen.
 
 "Thanks Primus you and windlord are ok, Kup" said Nighlight while she 
 hold back a moan, her wounds arent serious but the pain was 
 unbeareable
 
 "and the most important"said Windlord while he sat down and checked 
 his own wounds"who was he??? why is he here?"
 
 "He told me something... He's looking for Rodimus... We must told him 
 that he's in agreat danger "said worried the femme
 
 "What?"Said surpriced Windlord
 
 "He told me about a matrix of power and he liked that I lead him to 
 Rodimus... "said slowly Nighlight"I lied... he didnt know that i'm 
 his wife... I didnt told him anything... I didnt"
 
 Windlord looked with respect Nighlight, she took a great risk and he 
 knew why: For love.
 
 "Relax" said the male who also admired her bravely "we're safe 
 now... "
